statements: UPDATE sales_data SET sale_quantity = 20 WHERE product_id = 12345;

UPDATE inventory_data SET last_restock_date = '2022-05-15', current_stock = current_stock + 10 WHERE product_id = 201

UPDATE potential_stockouts SET units_available = units_available - 5 WHERE product_id = 5678;
